body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarLand Shipping Services! My name is Raymond Hill. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Raymond, my name is Tiffany Sanders.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Tiffany! Before we proceed, could you please provide me with your phone number, spelling out each digit?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven four three, two five eight, nine zero one six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Tiffany. Could you also confirm your home address, spelling it out as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three Maple Street, Apartment five zero two, Sun City.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I've noted down your contact details. Is there anything else I can assist you with today, Tiffany?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that covers everything, thank you so much for your help, Raymond.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Tiffany. Thank you for reaching out to CarLand Shipping Services. Have a wonderful day!
